title: Die Linke - Wikipedia
snippet: The party was founded in 2007 as ... the Socialist Unity Party of Germany (SED). Since October 2024, Die Linke's co-chairpersons have been Ines Schwerdtner and Jan van Aken....

title: How Die Linke Turned the Tide - Rosa-Luxemburg-Stiftung
snippet: Ines Schwerdtner and Jan van Aken have served as co-chairs of Die Linke since October 2024 and were both elected to parliament in the 2025 federal election.

title: How Die Linke Turned the Tide - RLS Geneva
snippet: We see this as our mission, and it’s one we wouldn’t trade for anything. Ines Schwerdtner and Jan van Aken have served as co-chairs of Die Linke since October 2024 and were both elected to parliament in the 2025 federal election.

title: The Improbable Resurgence of Die Linke
snippet: But becoming a party of the working class will take a lot more than a last-minute turnaround at the polls. Jan van Aken (L), federal chairman of Die Linke, and member of the Bundestag Gregor Gysi speak at a press conference in Berlin on February ...

title: Expats.one - What to make of Die Linke
snippet: At a televised debate on September 13th, Janine Wissler, the co-head of Die Linke, proclaimed again that her party wants to dissolve NATO and turn it into a collective security alliance that includes Russia.
